Affix_legendary_barb_001.desc: Whenever you deal direct damage while {c_important}Berserking{/c}, inflict {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*100|%|]{/c} of the base damage dealt as additional Bleeding damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_barb_001.name: of Berserk Ripping

Affix_legendary_barb_002.desc: {c_important}Ground Stomp{/c} creates an {c_important}Earthquake{/c} damaging enemies for {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Physical damage over {c_number}[PowerTag.Barbarian_Earthquake."Script Formula 1"]{/c} seconds. While standing in Earthquakes, you deal {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage.
Affix_legendary_barb_002.name: Earthquake

Affix_legendary_barb_003.desc: Stunning a Bleeding enemy deals {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of their total Bleeding amount to them as Physical damage.
Affix_legendary_barb_003.name: Skullbreaker's

Affix_legendary_barb_004.desc:
Your {c_important}Weapon Mastery{/c} Skills have an additional Charge.

{c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Damaging an enemy with a {c_important}Weapon Mastery{/c} Skill has up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to Stun them for {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_barb_004.name: Weapon Master's

Affix_legendary_barb_005.desc: Gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1 / Affix."Static Value 0" |1%|]{/c} Damage Reduction for each Nearby Bleeding enemy up to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} maximum.
Affix_legendary_barb_005.name: Iron Blood

Affix_legendary_barb_006.desc: Gain {c_important}Berserking{/c} for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds when you swap to this weapon.
Affix_legendary_barb_006.name: Battle-Mad

Affix_legendary_barb_007.desc: Your {c_important}Shout{/c} skills generate {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} Fury per second while active.
Affix_legendary_barb_007.name: of Echoing Fury

Affix_legendary_barb_009.desc: Increase {c_important}Frenzy's{/c} maximum stacks by {c_number}[Affix_Value_1]{/c}.Â  While you have maximum {c_important}Frenzy{/c}, your other Skills gain {c_random}+[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} increased Attack Speed.
Affix_legendary_barb_009.name: Frenzied

Affix_legendary_barb_010.desc: Reduces the Cooldown of {c_important}Leap{/c} by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} seconds per enemy hit, up to a max of {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_barb_010.name: of Giant Strides

Affix_legendary_barb_011.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Damaging an enemy with a {c_important}Core{/c} Skill has up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to extend the duration of {c_important}Berserking{/c} by {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} second. Double this duration if it was a Critical Strike.
Affix_legendary_barb_011.name: Relentless Berserker's

Affix_legendary_barb_013.desc: Killing an enemy with a {c_important}Core{/c} Skill refunds {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} of its base Fury cost. Can only happen once per Skill cast.
Affix_legendary_barb_013.name: of Unrelenting Fury

Affix_legendary_barb_014.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Damaging enemies with {c_important}Leap{/c}, {c_important}Upheaval{/c}, or {c_important}Whirlwind{/c} has up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to summon an Ancient to perform the same Skill. Can only happen once every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_barb_014.name: of Ancestral Echoes

Affix_legendary_barb_015.desc: Skills using this weapon deal {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1*100|1%|]{/c} increased damage per point of Fury you have, but you lose {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Fury every second.
Affix_legendary_barb_015.name: Crane Tribe

Affix_legendary_barb_017.desc: Each point of Fury generated while at maximum Fury grants {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1|1|]{/c} {c_important}Fortify{/c}.
Affix_legendary_barb_017.name: of Numbing Wrath

Affix_legendary_barb_018.desc: Enemies damaged by {c_important}Kick{/c} or {c_important}Charge{/c} will explode if they are killed within the next {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage to surrounding enemies.
Affix_legendary_barb_018.name: Brawler's

Affix_legendary_barb_019.desc: {c_important}Whirlwind{/c} leaves behind {c_important}Dust Devils{/c} that deal {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage to surrounding enemies.
Affix_legendary_barb_019.name: Dust Devil's

Affix_legendary_barb_020.desc: After spending {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Fury, your next {c_important}Weapon Mastery{/c} Skill deals {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage.
Affix_legendary_barb_020.name: of Encroaching Wrath

Affix_legendary_barb_021.desc: Gain {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased Fury Generation while all damage bonuses from {c_important}Walking Arsenal{/c} are active.
Affix_legendary_barb_021.name: of the Relentless Armsmaster

Affix_legendary_barb_022.desc: You gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} Fury per second while {c_important}Berserking{/c}.
Affix_legendary_barb_022.name: of Berserk Fury

Affix_legendary_barb_025.desc: {c_important}Whirlwind's{/c} Critical Strike Chance is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} for each second it is channeled, up to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1 * Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c}.
Affix_legendary_barb_025.name: of the Dire Whirlwind

Affix_legendary_barb_026.desc: {c_important}Leap{/c} creates an {c_important}Earthquake{/c} that deals {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Physical damage over {c_number}[PowerTag.Barbarian_Earthquake."Script Formula 1"]{/c} seconds. While standing in {c_important}Earthquakes{/c}, you gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased Damage Reduction.
Affix_legendary_barb_026.name: of Bul-Kathos

Affix_legendary_barb_027.desc: Casting {c_important}Double Swing{/c} twice within {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds creates a {c_important}Dust Devil{/c} that deals {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage to enemies behind the target.
Affix_legendary_barb_027.name: Windlasher

Affix_legendary_barb_040.desc: Each time a {c_important}Core{/c} Skill deals direct damage to an enemy, your next {c_important}Charge{/c} or {c_important}Leap{/c} deals {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage, up to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1 * Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c}.
Affix_legendary_barb_040.name: Veteran Brawler's

Affix_legendary_barb_041.desc: {c_important}Hammer of the Ancients{/c} quakes outwards, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of its damage to enemies.
Affix_legendary_barb_041.name: of Ancestral Force

Affix_legendary_barb_055.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_number}[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} chance to gain {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} {c_important}Fortify{/c} whenever you deal direct damage while {c_important}Berserking{/c}.
Affix_legendary_barb_055.name: Steadfast Berserker's

Affix_legendary_barb_057.desc: Whenever you cast a {c_important}Shout{/c} Skill, its Cooldown is reduced by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds per Nearby enemy, up to a maximum of {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_barb_057.name: Bold Chieftain's

Affix_legendary_barb_100.desc: Damaging an enemy with {c_important}Kick{/c} or {c_important}Ground Stomp{/c} resets {c_important}Leap's{/c} Cooldown.
Affix_legendary_barb_100.name: of Perpetual Stomping

Affix_legendary_barb_101.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to reduce the Cooldowns of your {c_important}non-Ultimate{/c} Skills by {c_number}[Affix_Value_2|1|]{/c} seconds when you inflict Bleeding on Elites.
Affix_legendary_barb_101.name: of Quickening Pulse

Affix_legendary_barb_102.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Direct damage against Bleeding enemies has up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to Stun them for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_barb_102.name: of Anemia

Affix_legendary_barb_103.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} You have up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to gain {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Fury when {c_important}Rend{/c} deals direct damage to at least one Bleeding enemy.
Affix_legendary_barb_103.name: Slaking

Affix_legendary_barb_104.desc: After swapping weapons {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} times, gain {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased Attack Speed for {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_barb_104.name: Windstriker's

Affix_legendary_barb_105.desc: After swapping weapons {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} times, gain {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} {c_important}Fortify{/c}.
Affix_legendary_barb_105.name: of Tempering Blows

Affix_legendary_barb_106.desc: Gain {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased Lucky Hit chance while all damage bonuses from {c_important}Walking Arsenal{/c} are active.
Affix_legendary_barb_106.name: Luckbringer

Affix_legendary_barb_107.desc: Killing an enemy while {c_important}Berserking{/c} has a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} chance to grant {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased Cooldown Reduction to your {c_important}Brawling{/c} Skills for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_barb_107.name: Bear Clan Berserker's

Affix_1HSword_Unique_Barb_100.desc: After generating {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Fury your next {c_important}Core{/c} Skill creates a {c_important}Dust Devil{/c} that deals {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage to enemies behind the target.
Affix_1HSword_Unique_Barb_100.flavor:
"Without him the wine is less sweet, the hearth less warm, and our blades less keen. He deserved to see ten thousand more suns. Our blood-brother is gone, but Bul-Kathos willing, we will meet again one day."
- Sorrowsong for Ramaladni
Affix_1HSword_Unique_Barb_100.name: Ramaladni's Magnum Opus

Affix_2HAxe_Unique_Barb_001.desc: {c_important}Steel Grasp{/c} launches {c_number}2{/c} additional chains. Enemies hit by {c_important}Steel Grasp{/c} are Slowed by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*100|%|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Affix_2HAxe_Unique_Barb_001.flavor:
"Weapons wielded by the fiercest warriors often catch the eye of the Ancient spirits. If the wielder is worthy, the spirits may bless the steel with their strength."
- Gerti, Oxen Tribe Forgemaster
Affix_2HAxe_Unique_Barb_001.name: Ancients' Oath

Affix_2HMace_Unique_Barb_001.desc: {c_important}Upheaval{/c} ignites the ground Burning enemies for an additional {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Affix_2HMace_Unique_Barb_001.flavor: The demon prince Ikonoth slew hundreds of the Heavenly Host with this infernal hammer before falling to none other than the Archangel Imperius himself.
Affix_2HMace_Unique_Barb_001.name: Hellhammer

Affix_2HMace_Unique_Barb_100.desc: {c_important}Death Blow{/c} creates a shockwave, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of its base damage to enemies. Enemies who die to this effect also reset {c_important}Death Blowâ€™s{/c} Cooldown.
Affix_2HMace_Unique_Barb_100.flavor: The malformed snake creatures that reside in the swamps are not content with simply killing their prey. They seem to take a malicious pleasure from inflicting as much suffering as possible before death.
Affix_2HMace_Unique_Barb_100.name: Overkill

Affix_2HSword_Unique_Barb_002.desc: While using this weapon, damaging at least one enemy with {c_important}Rupture{/c} creates a blood pool that inflicts {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Bleeding damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds. Enemies standing in the pool take {c_number}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased Bleeding damage.
Affix_2HSword_Unique_Barb_002.flavor:
"We've been fighting these flesh-eaters for so long, been soaked in so much blood, that after a while it's difficult to tell what side you're truly on."
- Daelyr, Crane Tribe warrior
Affix_2HSword_Unique_Barb_002.name: Fields of Crimson

Affix_Boots_Unique_Barb_100.desc: After gaining the final damage bonus from {c_important}Walking Arsenal{/c}, you automatically cast {c_important}Ground Stomp{/c} and gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} Fury. This cannot happen more than once every {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} seconds.
Affix_Boots_Unique_Barb_100.flavor:
"While many Barbarians remained in the Dreadlands, small groups from the Oxen, Crane and Bear tribes instead chose to search the land for a new home."
- A History of the Children of Bul-Kathos
Affix_Boots_Unique_Barb_100.name: 100,000 Steps

Affix_Chest_Unique_Barb_002.desc: While {c_important}Berserking{/c}, you deal {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Fire damage every second to surrounding enemies.
Affix_Chest_Unique_Barb_002.flavor: The city of Harrogath, the final bastion of resistance against Baal's assault on Mt. Arreat, was reduced to rubble when the Worldstone was destroyed. The survivors never forgave the betrayal that led to the loss of their home.
Affix_Chest_Unique_Barb_002.name: Rage of Harrogath

Affix_Gloves_Unique_Barb_001.desc: {c_important}Whirlwind{/c} explodes after it ends, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of the total base damage dealt to surrounding enemies as Fire damage.
Affix_Gloves_Unique_Barb_001.flavor:
"The brutish, almost simplistic construction of these gloves belies the strength they bestow. Gohr was clearly no craftsman, but it would be foolish to ignore the triumph of his work."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Affix_Gloves_Unique_Barb_001.name: Gohr's Devastating Grips

Affix_Ring_Unique_Barb_001.desc: Each point of Fury you generate while at max Fury grants your next {c_important}Core{/c} Skill {c_number}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage, up to {c_number}x[Affix_Value_1  * Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c}.
Affix_Ring_Unique_Barb_001.flavor:
"The change that overtook my brother in the heat of battle was terrifying. His eyes turned hard like diamonds, and the way he moved... it was like he was dancing to music only he could hear."
- Captain Davinus
Affix_Ring_Unique_Barb_001.name: Battle Trance

Affix_TESTstephen_unique_barbarian_mace2.desc: (PH) Consecutive Hammer of the Ancients increase the next cast's damage by {c_number}{Affix_Value_1}%{/c} up to {{Affix_Value_1}*2}% and its radius by {c_number}{Affix_Value_2}%{/c} up to {{Affix_Value_2}*2}%.
Affix_TESTstephen_unique_barbarian_mace2.name: of Hammering

Affix_legendary_druid_002.desc: After killing an enemy with {c_important}Shred{/c}, your next {c_important}Werewolf{/c} Skill generates {c_number}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} more Spirit and deals {c_number}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage.
Affix_legendary_druid_002.name: of the Unsatiated

Affix_legendary_druid_005.desc: Gain {c_number}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} Spirit when you are struck as a Werebear.
Affix_legendary_druid_005.name: Mangled

Affix_legendary_druid_010.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} {c_important}Wind Shear{/c} has up to a {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to fully restore your Spirit.
Affix_legendary_druid_010.name: of the Calm Breeze

Affix_legendary_druid_012.desc: Gain {c_important}Stealth{/c} for {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} seconds when killing enemies with {c_important}Shred{/c}. Breaking {c_important}Stealth{/c} with an attack grants Ambush which guarantees Critical Strikes for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_druid_012.name: _PrefixStalking Beast

Affix_legendary_druid_013.desc: {c_important}Hurricane{/c} damage is increased by {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} each second while active.
Affix_legendary_druid_013.name: of the Tempest

Affix_legendary_druid_018.desc: Damage from {c_important}Earth{/c} skills Slow enemies hit by {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_druid_018.name: of Quicksand

Affix_legendary_druid_023.desc: {c_important}Earth{/c} Skills deal {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} more Critical Strike damage to Crowd Controlled enemies.
Affix_legendary_druid_023.name: Crashstone

Affix_legendary_druid_026.desc: The duration of {c_important}Earthen Bulwark{/c} is increased by {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} seconds. In addition, killing an enemy with {c_important}Earth{/c} Skills replenishes {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} of your active {c_important}Earthen Bulwark's{/c} barrier.
Affix_legendary_druid_026.name: of Mending Stone

Affix_legendary_druid_028.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance when dealing Lightning damage to overload the target for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, causing any direct damage you deal to them to pulse {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} additional damage to surrounding enemies.
Affix_legendary_druid_028.name: Overcharged

Affix_legendary_druid_029.desc:
Casting a {c_important}Storm{/c} Skill grants your {c_important}Earth{/c} Skills {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} Critical Strike Damage for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.

Casting a {c_important}Earth{/c} Skill increases the Critical Strike Chance of {c_important}Storm{/c} Skills by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1 /3.75|1%|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_druid_029.name: of Natural Balance

Affix_legendary_druid_038.desc: {c_important}Werebear{/c} Skills restore {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} Spirit when you hit enemies afflicted by your Poisons. When Spirit is restored, your Poison effects are removed from the enemy.
Affix_legendary_druid_038.name: of the Changeling's Debt

Affix_legendary_druid_042.desc: When you use a {c_important}Shapeshifting{/c} Skill that changes your form, gain {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Life. If you are at full Life, gain the same amount as {c_important}Fortify{/c}.
Affix_legendary_druid_042.name: Skinwalker's

Affix_legendary_druid_047.desc: {c_important}Earthspike{/c} launches spikes in a line and has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} second cooldown.
Affix_legendary_druid_047.name: Seismic-shift

Affix_legendary_druid_049.desc: {c_important}Trample{/c} now summons {c_important}Landslides{/c} during it's duration that deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} normal damage. {c_important}Trample{/c} is now also a {c_important}Nature Magic{/c} and {c_important}Earth{/c} Skill.
Affix_legendary_druid_049.name: of the Trampled Earth

Affix_legendary_druid_057.desc: Your {c_important}Earth skills{/c} are now also {c_important}Werebear skills{/c} and {c_important}Fortify{/c} you for {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c}.
Affix_legendary_druid_057.name: Stonefur

Affix_legendary_druid_058.desc:
{c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} {c_important}Storm skills{/c} have up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to grant {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Spirit.

Your base {c_important}Storm{/c} Skills are now also {c_important}Werewolf{/c} Skills
Affix_legendary_druid_058.name: Storm Beast's

Affix_legendary_druid_059.desc: Critical strikes with {c_important}Shred{/c} deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of the damage dealt as lightning to the target and surrounding enemies.
Affix_legendary_druid_059.name: Stormclaw's

Affix_legendary_druid_060.desc: Increase your maximum Spirit by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} and Spirit Generation by {c_number}x[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} while {c_important}Grizzly Rage{/c} is active.
Affix_legendary_druid_060.name: Balanced

Affix_legendary_druid_062.desc: {c_important}Cyclone Armor{/c} also provides Physical Damage Reduction. In addition, {c_important}Cyclone Armor{/c} will also be applied to all Nearby Allies.
Affix_legendary_druid_062.name: of Cyclonic Force

Affix_legendary_druid_063.desc: Landslide strikes an additional {c_number}3{/c} times and deals an additional {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} bonus damage per strike.
Affix_legendary_druid_063.name: of The Aftershock

Affix_legendary_druid_066.desc: {c_important}Pulverize{/c} is now also an {c_important}Earth{/c} skill. After casting {c_important}Pulverize{/c}, tectonic spikes continue to deal {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_druid_066.name: of the Ursine Horror

Affix_legendary_druid_071.desc: Your {c_important}Core{/c} skills deal up to {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|] {/c} increased damage based on your percent {c_important}Fortified Health{/c}.
Affix_legendary_druid_071.name: of Retaliation

Affix_legendary_druid_074.desc: Pulverize creates a shockwave that travels forward, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of its damage to targets in the path.
Affix_legendary_druid_074.name: Shockwave

Affix_legendary_druid_075.desc: Your {c_important}Wolf{/c} companions are now {c_important}Werewolf{/c} companions. {c_important}Werewolf{/c} companions deal {c_number}+[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} additional damage and can spread {c_important}Rabies{/c}.
Affix_legendary_druid_075.name: of the Alpha

Affix_legendary_druid_077.desc: {c_important}Blood Howl{/c} increases Critical Strike Chance by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c}. In addition, {c_important}Blood Howl{/c} also affects Nearby Companions and Players for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_druid_077.name: Nighthowler's

Affix_legendary_druid_078.desc: {c_important}Werewolf{/c} Skills function as {c_important}Storm{/c} Skills and {c_important}Werebear{/c} Skills function as {c_important}Earth{/c} Skills for the {c_important}Nature's Fury{/c} passive.
Affix_legendary_druid_078.name: of Nature's Savagery

Affix_legendary_druid_080.desc: {c_important}Core{/c} Skills deal an additional {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} damage for each active Companion.
Affix_legendary_druid_080.name: Shepherd's

Affix_legendary_druid_100.desc: Gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} Damage Reduction while Shapeshifted into a Werewolf.
Affix_legendary_druid_100.name: Vigorous

Affix_legendary_druid_102.desc: {c_important}Debilitating Roar{/c} is now a {c_important}Werewolf{/c} Skill. In addition, {c_important}Debilitating Roar{/c} will Immobilize Poisoned enemies for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_druid_102.name: of the Dark Howl

Affix_legendary_druid_104.desc: The duration of {c_important}Grizzly Rage{/c} is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} seconds. In addition, Critical Strikes while {c_important}Grizzly Rage{/c} is active increase your Critical Strike Damage by {c_number}[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} for the duration.
Affix_legendary_druid_104.name: of the Rampaging Werebeast

Affix_legendary_druid_106.desc: Your {c_important}Companions{/c} gain the bonuses from {c_important}Bestial Rampage{/c}.
Affix_legendary_druid_106.name: of the Wildrage

Affix_legendary_druid_108.desc: When you have {c_important}Fortified{/c} Life your {c_important}Earth{/c} Skills gain {c_number}+[Affix_Value_1]{/c}.
Affix_legendary_druid_108.name: Ballistic

Affix_legendary_druid_109.desc: While {c_important}Hurricane{/c} is active, gain {c_number}+[Affix_Value_1]{/c} to your {c_important}Shapeshifting{/c} Skills.
Affix_legendary_druid_109.name: Stormshifter's

Affix_legendary_druid_111.desc: Critical strikes with {c_important}Storm{/c} Skills charge the air around you for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds causing a {c_important}Lightning Strike{/c} to periodically hit an enemy in the area for {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Lightning damage.
Affix_legendary_druid_111.name: Runeworker's Conduit

Affix_legendary_druid_112.desc: The {c_important}Earthen Might{/c} talent also applies to your {c_important}Storm{/c} skills.
Affix_legendary_druid_112.name: Mighty Storm's

Affix_legendary_druid_113.desc: When {c_important}Nature's Fury{/c} triggers a free Skill, reduce your non-Ultimate Cooldowns of the opposite type by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_druid_113.name: Symbiotic

Affix_legendary_druid_114.desc: Gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} bonus amount to your next {c_important}Earthen Bulwark{/c} for each enemy you Crowd Control up to a maximum of {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c}.
Affix_legendary_druid_114.name: Earthguard

Affix_1HAxe_Unique_Druid_001.desc: {c_important}Grizzly Rage{/c} now shapeshifts you into a Dire Werewolf. Dire Werewolf gains {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} movement speed instead of damage reduction and a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*2|%|]{/c} Spirit cost reduction bonus. In addition, kills heal you for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} of your maximum Life.
Affix_1HAxe_Unique_Druid_001.flavor: The nights preceding the full moon are sometimes far more dangerous than the event itself. The anticipation of the upcoming event can drive some werewolves into a fever from which they never recover.
Affix_1HAxe_Unique_Druid_001.name: Waxing Gibbous

Affix_1HMace_Unique_Druid_001.desc: {c_important}Lightning Storm{/c} Critical Strikes spawn {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} {c_important}Dancing Bolts{/c} that seek enemies in the area dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Lightning damage.
Affix_1HMace_Unique_Druid_001.flavor:
"Listen, child, to the music of the storm. It has its own rhythm. Its own melody. Hear how beautifully it sings, and perhaps one day you will be able to join in its harmony." 
â€“ Airidah
Affix_1HMace_Unique_Druid_001.name: Tempest Song

Affix_2HStaff_Unique_Druid_001.desc: {c_important}Claw{/c} is now a {c_important}Storm{/c} skill and also casts {c_important}Storm Strike{/c} at {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} normal damage.
Affix_2HStaff_Unique_Druid_001.flavor:
"She has existed in Scosglen since before Fiacla-GÃ©ar walked the land. Her purpose is a mystery, and she remains impartial in all conflicts. Approach her with deference, and she may grant you her counsel."
- Airidah, to Donan
Affix_2HStaff_Unique_Druid_001.name: Greatstaff of the Crone

Affix_Chest_Unique_Druid_002.desc: Werewolf form is now your true form, and you gain {c_number}+2{/c} to all {c_important}Werewolf{/c} skills.
Affix_Chest_Unique_Druid_002.flavor:
â€œHe was not a victim of the curse - he sought it out. As his skin split and his bones cracked, his laughter never ceased." 
â€“ Tale of the Mad Nobleman
Affix_Chest_Unique_Druid_002.name: Mad Wolf's Glee

Affix_Chest_Unique_Druid_003.desc: Werebear form is now your true form, and you gain {c_number}+2{/c} to all {c_important}Werebear{/c} skills.
Affix_Chest_Unique_Druid_003.flavor: When the Days of Ash fell upon Scosglen, the great druid Nafain reminded his disciples that nothing, not even the loss of their humanity, was too great a sacrifice to protect TÃºr DÃºlra from Astaroth's flames.
Affix_Chest_Unique_Druid_003.name: Insatiable Fury

Affix_Pants_Unique_Druid_001.desc: Your {c_important}Wolf Companions{/c} are infused with the power of the storm, dealing Lightning damage and gaining the {c_important}Storm Howl{/c} ability.
Affix_Pants_Unique_Druid_001.flavor:
"The storm's rage is my own, brother. I call, and the skies roar in reply."
- Vasily, to Bul-Kathos
Affix_Pants_Unique_Druid_001.name: Storm's Companion

Affix_Ring_Unique_Druid_001.desc: Gain {c_number}1{/c} additional companion. In addition, your {c_important}Companion Skills{/c} deal {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} bonus damage.
Affix_Ring_Unique_Druid_001.flavor:
"A sapling from the Great Oak, left to grow at the seaward statue of the Druid's Patriarch, will on rare occasions be found twisted back upon itself, suffused with natural magic."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Affix_Ring_Unique_Druid_001.name: Vasily's Prayer

Affix_Ring_Unique_Druid_003.desc:
Gain a bonus when you kill with a {c_important}Shapeshifting{/c} Skill:

{icon:bullet}{c_gold}Werewolf:{/c} Your next non-ultimate {c_important}Werebear{/c} Skill costs no resource and has no cooldown.
{icon:bullet}{c_gold}Werebear:{/c} Your next {c_important}Werewolf{/c} skill will heal you for {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} when damage is first dealt.
Affix_Ring_Unique_Druid_003.flavor:
"By fang, claw, spear, or sword - send the bastards back to the flames from which they crawled! Soak the peat with their blood! For Fiacla-GÃ©ar! For Scosglen!"
- Nafain, during the Days of Ash
Affix_Ring_Unique_Druid_003.name: Hunter's Zenith

Affix_legendary_generic_006.desc: Gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} resource for every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} Life healed.
Affix_legendary_generic_006.name: Starlight

Affix_legendary_generic_009.desc: {c_important}Basic{/c} skills grant {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} damage reduction for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_generic_009.name: of Might

Affix_legendary_generic_011.desc: Every {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} seconds, gain a {c_important}Barrier{/c} absorbing up to {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage.
Affix_legendary_generic_011.name: of the Protector

Affix_legendary_generic_014.desc: Deal {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} increased damage for each second you stand still, up to {c_number}x[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c}.
Affix_legendary_generic_014.name: of Inner Calm

Affix_legendary_generic_016.desc: Critical Strikes grant {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} Movement Speed for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} second. The duration can be extended.
Affix_legendary_generic_016.name: Wind Striker

Affix_legendary_generic_021.desc: Restore {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} resource when you Crowd Control an enemy.
Affix_legendary_generic_021.name: of the Umbral

Affix_legendary_generic_023.desc: Each consecutive {c_important}Core{/c} Skill cast reduces the resource cost of your next {c_important}Core{/c} Skills by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}, up to a maximum of {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c}.
Affix_legendary_generic_023.name: Ominous

Affix_legendary_generic_027.desc: Deal {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage while you have a {c_important}Barrier{/c} active.
Affix_legendary_generic_027.name: Conceited

Affix_legendary_generic_034.desc: When struck, a magical bubble forms around you for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, absorbing {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage. Can only occur once per {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_generic_034.name: Protecting

Affix_legendary_generic_036.desc: Enemies afflicted with a damage over time effect deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} less damage to you.
Affix_legendary_generic_036.name: of Disobedience

Affix_legendary_generic_038.desc: Deal {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/if}{/c} increased damage to Stunned, Knocked Down, and Frozen enemies.

Affix_legendary_generic_063.desc: Skills deal up to {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage based on available resource when cast, receiving the full benefit while at full resource.
Affix_legendary_generic_063.name: Edgemasterâ€™s

Affix_legendary_generic_065.desc: After standing still for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} seconds, you regenerate {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Life per second while enemies are Close.
Affix_legendary_generic_065.name: of the Patient Sage

Affix_legendary_generic_067.desc: Enemies hit with {c_important}Basic{/c} Skills increases the damage of your next {c_important}Core{/c} Skill by {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c}, up to {c_number}x[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c}.
Affix_legendary_generic_067.name: of the Expectant

Affix_legendary_generic_100.desc: You may move freely through enemies while below {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} total Life.

Affix_legendary_generic_102.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Strike:{/c} When you hit a Crowd Controlled enemy, there is up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance for that Crowd Control effect to spread to another unaffected enemy.
Affix_legendary_generic_102.name: of Shared Misery

Affix_legendary_generic_103.desc: Taking {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of your total Life in damage while Stunned, Frozen or Immobilized will clear the effect.
Affix_legendary_generic_103.name: Eluding

Affix_legendary_generic_104.desc: When you take damage from a damage over time effect, gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} resource.
Affix_legendary_generic_104.name: Assimilation

Affix_legendary_generic_106.desc: Thorns damage dealt has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to deal damage to all enemies around you.
Affix_legendary_generic_106.name: Needleflare

Affix_legendary_generic_107.desc: While you have a {c_important}Barrier{/c} active, there is a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to ignore incoming direct damage from Distant enemies.
Affix_legendary_generic_107.name: of the Deflecting Barrier

Affix_legendary_generic_108.desc: Effects that heal you beyond {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} Life grant you a {c_important}Barrier{/c} up to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life that lasts for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_generic_108.name: Restorative

Affix_legendary_generic_109.desc: Your Critical Strike Chance is increased by {c_random}[Crit_Percent_Bonus_Vs_CC_Target_Any*100|%|]{/c} against Crowd Controlled enemies.

Affix_1HAxe_Unique_Generic_001.desc: Immobilize your target for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds when you Critically Strike.
Affix_1HAxe_Unique_Generic_001.flavor: A nightmarish amalgam of blood, bone and steel, this axe is as horrific, and as deadly, as its creator.
Affix_1HAxe_Unique_Generic_001.name: The Butcher's Cleaver

Affix_1HSword_Unique_Generic_001.desc: Your skills have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to also deal {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Shadow damage to surrounding enemies and reduce their damage done by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} for {c_number}3{/c} seconds.
Affix_1HSword_Unique_Generic_001.flavor: Whenever this ancient sword has re-appeared throughout history, it portends a time of great strife, as well as a devastating loss of life.
Affix_1HSword_Unique_Generic_001.name: Doombringer

Affix_1HSword_Unique_Generic_100.desc: Critical Strikes with {c_important}Core{/c} Skills increase your Attack Speed by {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Affix_1HSword_Unique_Generic_100.flavor: Whenever you stare at the reflection in this blade, you see a demonic figure standing behind you: vague and distorted, but always laughing.
Affix_1HSword_Unique_Generic_100.name: Oblivion
