Affix_2HStaff_Unique_Generic_101.desc: After a Crowd Control effect wears off from an enemy, they take {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Affix_2HStaff_Unique_Generic_101.flavor:
"Also known as The Greatstaff of the Old Religion, this powerful relic is one of only a small handful of Skatsimi artifacts that have survived to this day."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Affix_2HStaff_Unique_Generic_101.name: Staff of Lam Esen

Affix_2HStaff_Unique_Generic_Boost_NoPow.desc: This is a test item used for max level boosts.
Affix_2HStaff_Unique_Generic_Boost_NoPow.name: Boost Staff

Affix_2HSword_Unique_Generic_001.desc:
Increases your critical strike damage by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}. 

The other properties on this weapon can roll higher than normal.
Affix_2HSword_Unique_Generic_001.flavor: An unbroken lineage of unwavering strength.
Affix_2HSword_Unique_Generic_001.name: The Grandfather

Affix_2HSword_Unique_Generic_Boost_NoPow.desc: This is a test item used for max level boosts.
Affix_2HSword_Unique_Generic_Boost_NoPow.name: Boost Sword

Affix_Amulet_Unique_Generic_100.desc: Gain {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|~%|]{/c} bonus maximum resource. In addition, when you take damage, drain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} resource for every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"|%|]{/c} of Life you would have lost instead.
Affix_Amulet_Unique_Generic_100.flavor:
"Do not allow your passions to become obsessions. Fuel the fire that burns within you, but it is madness to allow yourself to become ash to please an uncaring universe."
- Last words of Master Selig
Affix_Amulet_Unique_Generic_100.name: Melted Heart of Selig

Affix_Amulet_Unique_Generic_NoPowers.desc: This is a test item used for max level boosts.
Affix_Amulet_Unique_Generic_NoPowers.name: Boost Amulet

Affix_Boots_Unique_Generic_001.desc:
Leaves a trail of frost that {c_important}Chills{/c} enemies. 
{c_important}Chilled{/c} enemies take {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} more damage.
Affix_Boots_Unique_Generic_001.flavor: Remorseful devotees of the Cathedral of Light must undertake a grueling pilgrimage, journeying across the frigid glacier known as the Serac Rapture. Only then may their gravest sins be forgiven.
Affix_Boots_Unique_Generic_001.name: Penitent Greaves

Affix_Boots_Unique_Generic_Boost_NoPower.desc: This is a test item used for max level boosts.
Affix_Boots_Unique_Generic_Boost_NoPower.name: Boost Boots

Affix_Chest_Unique_Generic_100.flavor: Crafted by the cannibal Armoda, each piece of this interlocking armor has been sharpened into a knife's edge. Even a century after her death, the plate remained on her corpse, unable to be removed safely.
Affix_Chest_Unique_Generic_100.name: Razorplate

Affix_Chest_Unique_Generic_Boost_NoPower.desc: This is a test item used for max level boosts.
Affix_Chest_Unique_Generic_Boost_NoPower.name: Boost Armor

Affix_Gloves_Unique_Generic_002.desc: Your attacks randomly deal {c_number}[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of normal damage.
Affix_Gloves_Unique_Generic_002.flavor:
"Will you let fear cheat you, or will you risk everything to find understanding? After all, death is simply the coin with which we purchase life."
- Zurke
Affix_Gloves_Unique_Generic_002.name: Fists of Fate

Affix_Gloves_Unique_Generic_003.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to {c_important}Freeze{/c} enemies for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Affix_Gloves_Unique_Generic_003.flavor: A touch so frigid it stops the heart and chills the very soul.
Affix_Gloves_Unique_Generic_003.name: Frostburn

Affix_Gloves_Unique_Generic_Boost_NoPowe.desc: This is a test item used for max level boosts.
Affix_Gloves_Unique_Generic_Boost_NoPowe.name: Boost Gloves

Affix_Helm_Unique_Generic_001.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to trigger a poison nova that deals {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Poison damage.
Affix_Helm_Unique_Generic_001.flavor: The horrific whispers of the Maiden of Anguish flicker through your mind, pushing you ever closer to madness...
Affix_Helm_Unique_Generic_001.name: Andariel's Visage

Affix_Helm_Unique_Generic_002.desc:
Gain {c_number}x[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} damage reduction. 
In addition, gain {c_number}+[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} to all skills.
Affix_Helm_Unique_Generic_002.flavor:
"This headdress was once worn by an assassin who disguised herself as a court mage. Her treachery was unveiled, but not before she used its magic to curse the king and his entire lineage."
- The Fall of House Aston
Affix_Helm_Unique_Generic_002.name: Harlequin Crest

Affix_Helm_Unique_Generic_Boost_NoPowers.desc: This is a test item used for max level boosts.
Affix_Helm_Unique_Generic_Boost_NoPowers.name: Boost Helm

Affix_Pants_Unique_Generic_Boost_NoPower.desc: This is a test item used for max level boosts.
Affix_Pants_Unique_Generic_Boost_NoPower.name: Boost Pants

Affix_Ring_Unique_Generic_100.desc: If a {c_important}Core{/c} skill hits at least {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} or more enemies, {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of the resource cost is refunded.
Affix_Ring_Unique_Generic_100.flavor: The Cult of the Triune has been thought destroyed several times over the centuries. In reality, its members hide in temples across Sanctuary, awaiting the next great power that will promise them ascendancy.
Affix_Ring_Unique_Generic_100.name: Signet of the Triune

Affix_Ring_Unique_Generic_Boost_NoPowers.desc: This is a test item used for max level boosts.
Affix_Ring_Unique_Generic_Boost_NoPowers.name: Boost Ring

Affix_Ring_Unique_Generic_Boost_NoPowers.desc: This is a test item used for max level boosts.
Affix_Ring_Unique_Generic_Boost_NoPowers.name: Boost Ring

Affix_legendary_necro_002.desc: Each time one of your {c_important}Summoning{/c} Minions damages an enemy, they gain {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} Attack Speed for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, up to {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1*Affix."Static Value 1"|%|]{/c}.
Affix_legendary_necro_002.name: of Frenzied Dead

Affix_legendary_necro_011.desc: When you pick up {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} {c_important}Blood Orbs{/c}, a free {c_important}Bone Spirit{/c} is spawned, dealing bonus damage based on your current Life percent.
Affix_legendary_necro_011.name: of Possessed Blood

Affix_legendary_necro_012.desc: After hitting {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} enemy, {c_important}Bone Spear's{/c} damage is increased by {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.
Affix_legendary_necro_012.name: Splintering

Affix_legendary_necro_016.desc: Enemies take {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage from {c_important}Blight's{/c} defiled area for each second they are in it, up to {c_random}x[Affix."Static Value 0" * Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.
Affix_legendary_necro_016.name: of Plunging Darkness

Affix_legendary_necro_017.desc: {c_important}Blight's{/c} defiled area, when spawned, Pulls in enemies around the affected area.
Affix_legendary_necro_017.name: of the Void

Affix_legendary_necro_020.desc: {c_important}Decompose{/c} can chain up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} additional targets. When {c_important}Decompose{/c} spawns a Corpse, it has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to spawn a Corpse under all afflicted targets.
Affix_legendary_necro_020.name: Rotting

Affix_legendary_necro_022.desc: Each target hit along {c_important}Sever's{/c} path increases the scythe's damage by {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}, up to {c_random}x[Affix."Static Value 0" * Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.
Affix_legendary_necro_022.name: of Empowering Reaper

Affix_legendary_necro_023.desc: Every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds, your {c_important}Cold Skeletal Mages{/c} cast a blizzard that deals {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Cold damage and continuously {c_important}Chills{/c} enemies for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 2"/Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_necro_023.name: Coldbringer's

Affix_legendary_necro_028.desc: {c_important}Blood Lance{/c} deals {c_number}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage to its primary target per lanced target.
Affix_legendary_necro_028.name: Blood Seeker's

Affix_legendary_necro_029.desc: When {c_important}Blood Lance{/c} hits an enemy that is already lanced, it has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to fire a {c_important}Blood Lance{/c} at a Nearby target.
Affix_legendary_necro_029.name: of Hungry Blood

Affix_legendary_necro_031.desc: Your maximum number of Skeletal Mages is increased by {c_number}[Affix_Value_1]{/c}.
Affix_legendary_necro_031.name: Viscous

Affix_legendary_necro_032.desc: {c_important}Blood Mist{/c} leaves a trail that lasts for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds and deals {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Shadow damage per second to enemies who stand in it. Your Movement Speed is no longer reduced while {c_important}Blood Mist{/c} is active.
Affix_legendary_necro_032.name: of Bloodbath

Affix_legendary_necro_036.desc: {c_important}Bone Spirit{/c} deals increased damage based on distance traveled, up to {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.
Affix_legendary_necro_036.name: of Swelling Curse

Affix_legendary_necro_038.desc: When a segment of {c_important}Bone Prison{/c} is destroyed or expired, it deals {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage in an area around itself.
Affix_legendary_necro_038.name: of Bursting Bones

Affix_legendary_necro_041.desc: {c_important}Corpse Explosion{/c} consumes up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} additional Corpses around the initial Corpse, dealing {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage and with a {c_random}[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} larger radius per additional Corpse.
Affix_legendary_necro_041.name: of Corpse Boom

Affix_legendary_necro_053.desc: While {c_important}Army of the Dead{/c} is active, your Minions gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} Attack Speed and take {c_number}[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} reduced damage.
Affix_legendary_necro_053.name: Unyielding Commander's

Affix_legendary_necro_054.desc: Each time that {c_important}Bone Storm{/c} damages an enemy, gain a {c_important}Barrier{/c} equal to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of your Base Life for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_necro_054.name: of Shielding Storm

Affix_legendary_necro_066.desc: Enemies who are Stunned by {c_important}Corpse Tendrils{/c} are also made {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} for its duration. If they die while Stunned, they have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to spawn a {c_important}Blood Orb{/c}.
Affix_legendary_necro_066.name: of Grasping Veins

Affix_legendary_necro_067.desc: Your maximum number of Skeletal Warriors is increased by {c_number}[Affix_Value_1]{/c}.
Affix_legendary_necro_067.name: Blood Getter's

Affix_legendary_necro_100.desc: Critical Strikes with {c_important}Bone{/c} Skills increase your Essence Regeneration by {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Affix Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_necro_100.name: of Torment

Affix_legendary_necro_101.desc: The {c_important}Ossified Essence{/c} Passive also increases the Critical Strike Damage of your {c_important}Bone{/c} Skills by {c_number}+[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} per Essence above {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c}, up to {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.
Affix_legendary_necro_101.name: of Serration

Affix_legendary_necro_102.desc: {c_important}Bone Storm{/c} increases your Critical Strike Chance by {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} while active.
Affix_legendary_necro_102.name: Osseous Gale

Affix_legendary_necro_103.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} chance to generate {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} Essence when hitting a {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} enemy with your {c_important}Bone{/c} Skills.
Affix_legendary_necro_103.name: of Exposed Flesh

Affix_legendary_necro_104.desc: The {c_important}Shadowblight{/c} Passive deals {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage against Slowed or Chilled enemies, and {c_random}x[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} increased damage against Stunned enemies instead.
Affix_legendary_necro_104.name: Blighted

Affix_legendary_necro_105.desc: Enemies afflicted by your {c_important}Iron Maiden{/c} have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to be Stunned for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} second when they deal direct damage.
Affix_legendary_necro_105.name: Torturous

Affix_legendary_necro_106.desc: You deal {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased Shadow Damage to enemies afflicted by both {c_important}Decrepify{/c} and {c_important}Iron Maiden{/c}.
Affix_legendary_necro_106.name: of the Damned

Affix_legendary_necro_107.desc: The {c_important}Shadowblight{/c} Passive has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to form a Corpse each time it triggers.
Affix_legendary_necro_107.name: of Decay

Affix_legendary_necro_108.desc: {c_important}Blood Surgeâ€™s{/c} nova echoes again after a short delay, dealing {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} less damage.
Affix_legendary_necro_108.name: Blood-bathed

Affix_legendary_necro_109.desc: {c_important}Blood Wave{/c} fires two additional waves, each dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} less damage than the previous.
Affix_legendary_necro_109.name: Tidal

Affix_legendary_necro_110.desc: {c_important}Blood Orbs{/c} reduce your {c_important}Ultimate{/c} Cooldown by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_necro_110.name: Fastblood

Affix_legendary_necro_111.desc: The {c_important}Rathmaâ€™s Vigor{/c} Passive's bonuses persist for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} seconds after you are no longer {c_important}Healthy{/c}.
Affix_legendary_necro_111.name: of Rathmaâ€™s Chosen

Affix_legendary_necro_112.desc: While the {c_important}Rathmaâ€™s Vigor{/c} Passive is active, you gain {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} Movement Speed.
Affix_legendary_necro_112.name: of Untimely Death

Affix_legendary_necro_113.desc: While at full Life, {c_important}Blood Orbs{/c} grant {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} Essence.
Affix_legendary_necro_113.name: of Potent Blood

Affix_legendary_necro_114.desc: Each time your {c_important}Golem{/c} damages an enemy, its active Cooldown is reduced by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_necro_114.name: Hulking

Affix_legendary_necro_115.desc: The {c_important}Strength in Numbers{/c} Passive also grants your {c_important}Minions{/c} {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased Damage Reduction.
Affix_legendary_necro_115.name: of Hardened Bones

Affix_legendary_necro_117.desc: You gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} maximum Essence per active {c_important}Minion{/c}.
Affix_legendary_necro_117.name: Requiem

Affix_legendary_necro_118.desc: Your {c_important}Skeletons{/c} gain increased damage while alive, up to {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} after {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_necro_118.name: of Reanimation

Affix_legendary_necro_119.desc: Consuming a {c_important}Corpse{/c} increases the damage of your next {c_important}Core{/c} Skill by {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}, up to {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c}.
Affix_legendary_necro_119.name: Cadaverous

Affix_legendary_necro_120.desc: Consuming a {c_important}Corpse{/c} has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to spawn a {c_important}Blood Orb{/c}.
Affix_legendary_necro_120.name: of the Embalmer

Affix_2HScythe_Unique_Necro_100.desc:
Your {c_important}Darkness{/c} Skills {c_important}Chill{/c} enemies for up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c}. 

{c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Your {c_important}Darkness{/c} Skills have up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"|%|]{/c} chance to generate {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} additional Essence against {c_important}Frozen{/c} targets.
Affix_2HScythe_Unique_Necro_100.flavor:
"My companion swung her strange weapon in a wide arc, and our pursuer stopped short. The look of horror on his face as his body fell to pieces will haunt me forever."
- The Ebon Pages, Canto II, Verse XI
Affix_2HScythe_Unique_Necro_100.name: Bloodless Scream

Affix_Amulet_Unique_Necro_100.desc: {c_important}Blood Surge{/c} casts a mini nova on your {c_important}Minions{/c}, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage. Damage is increased by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} per target drained by the initial cast, up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"|%|]{/c}.
Affix_Amulet_Unique_Necro_100.flavor: Once a sanctum for Rathma's studies, the Temple of the Deathspeaker was most recently used as proving grounds for potential leaders of his priesthood. Its halls are filled with the corpses of those who failed.
Affix_Amulet_Unique_Necro_100.name: Deathspeaker's Pendant

Affix_Boots_Unique_Necro_100.desc: Create desecrated ground beneath your {c_important}Sever{/c} spectres as they travel, damaging enemies for {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Shadow damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Affix_Boots_Unique_Necro_100.flavor:
"The massive stone door to my family's crypt, which had taken a dozen stout men to close, was thrown open wide. If I had known the horrors to come I would never have set foot inside that accursed place!"
- The Ebon Pages, Canto I, Verse VII
Affix_Boots_Unique_Necro_100.name: Greaves of the Empty Tomb

Affix_Chest_Unique_Necro_100.desc:
{c_important}Bone Storm{/c} and {c_important}Blood Wave{/c} are also {c_important}Darkness{/c} Skills and deal Shadow damage. 

Enemies damaged by {c_important}Bone Storm{/c} take {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Shadow damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds.

{c_important}Blood Wave{/c} desecrates the ground it travels over, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1*Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Shadow damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 2"]{/c} seconds
Affix_Chest_Unique_Necro_100.flavor: The dark wisps that crawl across this armor burrow into magic the way maggots might bore through putrid flesh.
Affix_Chest_Unique_Necro_100.name: Shadowclad Cuirass

Affix_Gloves_Unique_Necro_100.desc: Instead of detonating immediately, {c_important}Corpse Explosion{/c} summons a volatile undead that charges at a random enemy and explodes. {c_important}Corpse Explosion's{/c} damage is increased by {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.
Affix_Gloves_Unique_Necro_100.flavor:
"Can you not hear it? That endless scream from the cold earth beneath your feet!? They are down there, trapped, blind with rage! Waiting to drag us down into the sod!"
- Ravings of Madman Gustav
Affix_Gloves_Unique_Necro_100.name: Howl from Below

Affix_Helm_Unique_Necro_100.desc: Bone Spear leaves behind echoes as it travels that explode, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage.
Affix_Helm_Unique_Necro_100.flavor:
"Rathma is endless. He was the first of the Ancients, and only he will remain at the end. He is the true master of the Great Cycle of Being. When Death eventually comes for him, why should he fear it?"
- Vauntus, Acolyte of Rathma
Affix_Helm_Unique_Necro_100.name: Deathless Visage

Affix_Pants_Unique_Necro_100.desc:
{c_important}Blood Mist{/c} triggers {c_important}Corpse Explosion{/c} on surrounding Corpses. 
When {c_important}Blood Mist{/c} detonates a Corpse, its Cooldown is reduced by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds.
Affix_Pants_Unique_Necro_100.flavor:
"The infamous Necromancer Gaza-Thul's mastery over blood magic was indisputable. Many suspect that upon his death, his skin was used to fashion these eldritch leggings."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Affix_Pants_Unique_Necro_100.name: Blood Artisan's Brais

Affix_Ring_Unique_Necro_100.desc:
While your {c_important}Minions{/c} are improved by the {c_important}Strength in Numbers{/c} Passive, you gain:

{c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} chance to empower all of your {c_important}Minions{/c}, causing the next attack from each to explode for {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Physical damage.
Affix_Ring_Unique_Necro_100.flavor: The signet ring of Mendeln ul-Diomed, the founder of the Priests of Rathma and the first Necromancer, was lost for over 3,000 years. The power over life and death held within, however, has not dimished.
Affix_Ring_Unique_Necro_100.name: Ring of Mendeln

Affix_legendary_rogue_003.desc:
{c_important}Shadow Clone{/c} also mimics the {c_important}Imbuements{/c} applied to your Skills. 
Casting an {c_important}Imbuement{/c} Skill grants your {c_important}Shadow Clone{/c} {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_rogue_003.name: of Imitated Imbuement

Affix_legendary_rogue_004.desc: Gain a {c_important}Dark Shroud{/c} shadow every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds when standing still. Each {c_important}Dark Shroud{/c} shadow grants {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} increased Damage Reduction.
Affix_legendary_rogue_004.name: Enshrouding

Affix_legendary_rogue_008.desc: Your {c_important}Rain of Arrows{/c} is always affected by all {c_important}Imbuements{/c} Skills at once.
Affix_legendary_rogue_008.name: of Sleeting Imbuements

Affix_legendary_rogue_010.desc: Whenever {c_important}Penetrating Shot{/c} damages an enemy, {c_number}2{/c} additional arrows split off to either side. These side arrows deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of {c_important}Penetrating Shot's{/c} base damage and do not split.
Affix_legendary_rogue_010.name: Trickshot

Affix_legendary_rogue_011.desc: {c_important}Flurry{/c} damages enemies in a circle around you and deals {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage.
Affix_legendary_rogue_011.name: of Encircling Blades

Affix_legendary_rogue_013.desc: When a {c_important}Dark Shroud{/c} shadow would be removed it explodes, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Shadow damage around you.
Affix_legendary_rogue_013.name: of Volatile Shadows

Affix_legendary_rogue_014.desc: Damaging an {c_important}Injured{/c} enemy with a {c_important}Basic{/c} Skill generates {c_number}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} Energy.
Affix_legendary_rogue_014.name: Energizing

Affix_legendary_rogue_018.desc: When you {c_important}Evade{/c} or {c_important}Shadow Step{/c}, you leave behind a cluster of {c_important}Stun Grenades{/c} that explode and deal {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} total Physical damage and Stunning enemies for {c_number}[PowerTag.Rogue_Grenades."Script Formula 2"|2|]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_rogue_018.name: of Surprise

Affix_legendary_rogue_019.desc: {c_important}Caltrops{/c} also throw a cluster of {c_important}Stun Grenades{/c} that explode and deal {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} total Physical damage and Stunning enemies for {c_number}[PowerTag.Rogue_Grenades."Script Formula 2"|2|]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_rogue_019.name: Trickster's

Affix_legendary_rogue_020.desc: Casting a Skill that is {c_important}Imbued{/c} creates an explosion around you, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage of the same type.
Affix_legendary_rogue_020.name: of Unstable Imbuements

Affix_legendary_rogue_021.desc: {c_important}Twisting Blades{/c} cause an explosion when they return to you, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage and {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1*0.5/5]{/c} additional damage based on the distance the blades travel, up to {c_number}5{/c} meters and {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1*1.5]{/c} total damage.
Affix_legendary_rogue_021.name: of Volatile Blades

Affix_legendary_rogue_023.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Damaging a Poisoned enemy has up to a {c_number}50%{/c} chance to create a toxic explosion that applies {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Poison damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds to the target and surrounding enemies.
Affix_legendary_rogue_023.name: Venomous

Affix_legendary_rogue_024.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Damaging a Close enemy with a {c_important}Core{/c} Skill has up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} chance to release an explosion that deals {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Cold damage to the target and surrounding enemies, {c_important}Chilling{/c} them for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"|%|]{/c}.
Affix_legendary_rogue_024.name: of Chilling Presence

Affix_legendary_rogue_026.desc: When you cast {c_important}Dash{/c}, a Shadow Clone is spawned at your location that also casts {c_important}Dash{/c}, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of the base damage.
Affix_legendary_rogue_026.name: Shadowslicer

Affix_legendary_rogue_028.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Your {c_important}Ranged{/c} skills have up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 2"|%|]{/c} chance to create an arrow storm at the target's present location, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Physical damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds. You can have up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} active arrow storms.
Affix_legendary_rogue_028.name: of Arrow Storms

Affix_legendary_rogue_100.desc: {c_important}Barrage's{/c} arrows have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to split into {c_number}2{/c} arrows whenever they ricochet.
Affix_legendary_rogue_100.name: of Branching Volleys

Affix_legendary_rogue_101.desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Dealing direct damage to enemies affected by your {c_important}Trap{/c} Skills has up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to make them {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_rogue_101.name: Blast-Trapper's

Affix_legendary_rogue_102.desc:
Your {c_important}Grenades{/c} Skills count as {c_important}Trap{/c} Skills. 
Whenever you arm a {c_important}Trap{/c} or drop {c_important}Grenades{/c}, you gain {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased Movement Speed for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_rogue_102.name: of Explosive Verve

Affix_legendary_rogue_103.desc: Whenever you trigger a Lucky Hit, gain {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased Damage Reduction for {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} seconds, up to a maximum of {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c}.
Affix_legendary_rogue_103.name: of Uncanny Resilience

Affix_legendary_rogue_104.desc: Explosions from the {c_important}Victimize{/c} Passive Heal you for {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Life for each enemy damaged, up to a maximum of {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Life.
Affix_legendary_rogue_104.name: of Cruel Sustenance

Affix_legendary_rogue_105.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Making an enemy {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} has up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to grant {c_number}+[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Chance for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds, up to {c_number}+[Affix."Static Value 0" * Affix."Static Value 2"|%|]{/c}.
Affix_legendary_rogue_105.name: Vengeful

Affix_legendary_rogue_106.desc: Killing a {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} enemy grants you {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased Energy Regeneration for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_rogue_106.name: Ravenous

Affix_legendary_rogue_107.desc: Upon taking damage from surrounding enemies, drop a {c_important}Smoke Grenade{/c} and gain a {c_important}Barrier{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds that absorbs {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage. This effect can only occur once every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_rogue_107.name: Escape Artist's

Affix_legendary_rogue_108.desc: Each stack of {c_important}Momentum{/c} grants you {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Thorns.
Affix_legendary_rogue_108.name: Barbed

Affix_legendary_rogue_109.desc: When you break {c_important}Concealment{/c}, you drop a cluster of {c_important}Stun Grenades{/c} around your location that explode, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} total Physical damage and Stunning enemies for {c_number}[PowerTag.Rogue_Grenades."Script Formula 2"|2|]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_rogue_109.name: Opportunist's

Affix_legendary_rogue_110.desc: You automatically drop a {c_important}Smoke Grenade{/c} at the end of {c_important}Dash{/c}. {c_important}Dash's{/c} cooldown is reduced by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|2|]{/c} seconds for each enemy {c_important}Dazed{/c} this way, up to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 0"|2|]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_rogue_110.name: of Quickening Fog

Affix_legendary_rogue_111.desc: You take {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} less damage from Crowd Controlled enemies. Whenever a Crowd Controlled enemy deals direct damage to you, gain {c_number}+[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} Movement Speed for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_rogue_111.name: Cheat's

Affix_legendary_rogue_112.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Damaging a {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} enemy with a {c_important}Core{/c} Skill has up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to grant a {c_important}Barrier{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds that absorbs {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage, up to a maximum of {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c}.
Affix_legendary_rogue_112.name: of Siphoned Protection

Affix_legendary_rogue_113.desc: Your {c_important}Imbuements{/c} Skill effects have {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased potency against {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} enemies.
Affix_legendary_rogue_113.name: of Corruption

Affix_legendary_rogue_114.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Dealing direct damage to a {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} enemy has up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to Immobilize them for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_rogue_114.name: Mangler's

Affix_legendary_rogue_115.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Damaging a {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} enemy with a {c_important}Ranged{/c} or {c_important}Melee{/c} Skill has up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to summon a Shadow Clone that mimics your attack.
Affix_legendary_rogue_115.name: of Ruthless Mimicry

Affix_legendary_rogue_116.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Critical Strikes with {c_important}Ranged{/c} Skills have up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to grant a {c_important}Barrier{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds that absorbs {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage, up to a maximum of {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c}.
Affix_legendary_rogue_116.name: Draining

Affix_1HDagger_Unique_Rogue_001.desc: Your {c_important}Core{/c} Skills deal {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage per {c_important}Combo Point{/c} spent. However, your {c_important}Basic{/c} Skills using this weapon have a {c_number}[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} chance to generate {c_number}0{/c} {c_important}Combo Points{/c}.
Affix_1HDagger_Unique_Rogue_001.flavor:
"I've never seen such ruthless butchery. He deserves to be be shipped off to die in the swamps with the rest of the godless murderers."
- Witness to the murder of Sergeant Walcot
Affix_1HDagger_Unique_Rogue_001.name: Condemnation

Affix_1HDagger_Unique_Rogue_002.desc: Hits with this weapon increase your Attack Speed by {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1 * 100|1%|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, up to {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 1" * 100|1%|]{/c}.
Affix_1HDagger_Unique_Rogue_002.flavor: When Caldeum's gates closed, Asheara led her Iron Wolves out of the city knowing full well they would never return. Instead they roamed Kehjistan pledging their blades to any who were in need.
Affix_1HDagger_Unique_Rogue_002.name: Asheara's Khanjar

Affix_2HBow_Unique_Rogue_001.desc: The first direct damage you deal to an enemy is a guaranteed Critical Strike. If you had maximum {c_important}Precision{/c} stacks when you cast the Skill, gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} {c_important}Energy{/c}, this can only happen once per cast.
Affix_2HBow_Unique_Rogue_001.flavor:
"Genai took up her bow and, drawing back the string, aimed at the sun itself. The sun burned her eyes, but her arrow flew true. Wounded, the sun hid, and brought forth the first night.
- Fable of "The Great Sky-Hunt"
Affix_2HBow_Unique_Rogue_001.name: Skyhunter

Affix_2HBow_Unique_Rogue_006.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Hits with this weapon have up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to deal double damage and Knock Back the target.
Affix_2HBow_Unique_Rogue_006.flavor:
"There have been numerous world-shaping conflicts throughout history. This bow has been found on the battlefield of every one, and always in the hands of the victors."
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Affix_2HBow_Unique_Rogue_006.name: Windforce

Affix_2HCrossbow_Unique_Rogue_100.desc: {c_important}Rapid Fire{/c} has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to ricochet to another target.
Affix_2HCrossbow_Unique_Rogue_100.flavor:
Let the great gates of Caldeum be sealed. Let its proud walls stand fiercely defended. The rest of Kehjistan may be forced to suffer this plague, but my city, and my people, will not." 
- Proclamation of Hakan II
Affix_2HCrossbow_Unique_Rogue_100.name: Word of Hakan

Affix_Helm_Unique_Rogue_001.desc: You gain {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased Lucky Hit Chance against Crowd Controlled enemies.
Affix_Helm_Unique_Rogue_001.flavor:
"He is banished from the Guild, his name stricken from the Book. His punishment is to never have been." 
- Excerpt from a burned parchment
Affix_Helm_Unique_Rogue_001.name: Cowl of the

Affix_Pants_Unique_Rogue_004.desc: {c_important}Death Trap{/c} {c_important}Freezes{/c} enemies for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, but deals {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of its base damage.
Affix_Pants_Unique_Rogue_004.flavor:
"From that day forth, he knew whenever he felt that strange cold breeze on the nape of his neck that Ashen Jack was somewhere very close by, watching and waiting."
- Greenslade's Tales, Chapter 2: "A Cold Wind Blows"
Affix_Pants_Unique_Rogue_004.name: Chill of Night

Affix_Pants_Unique_Rogue_100.desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to gain a {c_important}Barrier{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds that absorbs {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage for each stack of Momentum you have, up to a maximum of {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} damage.
Affix_Pants_Unique_Rogue_100.flavor:
"The revelation that master tailor Callas was in fact a witch only served to further fuel the desire for her uniquely enchanted legwraps." 
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Affix_Pants_Unique_Rogue_100.name: Temerity

Affix_legendary_sorc_004.desc: {c_important}Flame Shield{/c} lets you move unhindered through enemies. Enemies you move through while {c_important}Flame Shield{/c} is active are Immobilized for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_sorc_004.name: of Binding Embers

Affix_legendary_sorc_006.desc: While within your own {c_important}Blizzard{/c}, you take {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} less damage.
Affix_legendary_sorc_006.name: Snowguard's

Affix_legendary_sorc_008.desc: {c_important}Meteor{/c_important} deals {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c_number} increased Critical Strike Damage against {c_important}Healthy{/c} targets.
Affix_legendary_sorc_008.name: of Three Curses

Affix_legendary_sorc_012.desc: {c_important}Charged Bolts{/c} gains {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} extra projectiles, but its Mana cost is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c}.
Affix_legendary_sorc_012.name: of Overwhelming Bolts

Affix_legendary_sorc_017.desc: {c_important}Frost Nova{/c_important} gains an additional Charge but the Cooldown per Charge is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*100|%|]{/c}.
Affix_legendary_sorc_017.name: Frostblitz

Affix_legendary_sorc_027.desc: Collecting {c_important}Crackling Energy{/c} increases your Movement Speed by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_sorc_027.name: Charged

Affix_legendary_sorc_035.desc: {c_important}Frozen Orb{/c} stays in place after reaching its destination and explodes {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} additional times for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of its damage.
Affix_legendary_sorc_035.name: of Frozen Orbit

Affix_legendary_sorc_037.desc: {c_important}Charged Bolts{/c} pierce, but deal {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} less damage.
Affix_legendary_sorc_037.name: Rolling Thunder

Affix_legendary_sorc_039.desc: You may have {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} additional {c_important}Hydra{/c} active, but {c_important}Hydraâ€™s{/c} Mana cost is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.
Affix_legendary_sorc_039.name: Hydra Masterâ€™s

Affix_legendary_sorc_043.desc:
{c_important}Meteorites{/c} fall around you during {c_important}Inferno{/c}, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Fire damage on impact. 
Your {c_important}Meteorites{/c} {c_important}Immobilize{/c} enemies for {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_sorc_043.name: of Armageddon

Affix_legendary_sorc_100.desc: While Channeling {c_important}Incinerate{/c}, your Burning damage is increased by {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.
Affix_legendary_sorc_100.name: of Conflagration

Affix_legendary_sorc_101.desc: {c_important}Esuâ€™s Ferocity{/c} no longer grants a Burning Damage bonus, but its Direct Damage bonus is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.
Affix_legendary_sorc_101.name: of Ancient Flame

Affix_legendary_sorc_102.desc: Burning Damage has a {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased chance to trigger Lucky Hits.
Affix_legendary_sorc_102.name: of Blazing Fortune

Affix_legendary_sorc_103.desc: Killing a Burning enemy grants {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} Mana Cost reduction for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, up to {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1*Affix."Static Value 1"|%|]{/c}.
Affix_legendary_sorc_103.name: Incendiary

Affix_legendary_sorc_104.desc: Every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} times you deal Direct Fire Damage to an enemy, they are Immobilized for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_sorc_104.name: of Seared Flesh

Affix_legendary_sorc_105.desc: Coming in contact with your {c_important}Firewall{/c} grants you {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} Movement Speed for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_sorc_105.name: Flamewalkerâ€™s

Affix_legendary_sorc_106.desc:
{c_important}Meteorites{/c} fall around {c_important}Meteor{/c}, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Fire damage on impact. 
Your {c_important}Meteorites{/c} additionally Burn enemies they hit for {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_sorc_106.name: of Shattered Stars

Affix_legendary_sorc_107.desc: When you cast {c_important}Blizzard{/c} it will periodically spawn exploding {c_important}Ice Spikes{/c} that deal {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage. Your {c_important}Ice Spikes{/c} deal {c_number}[Affix_Value_1 * 100|%|]{/c} increased damage to {c_important}Frozen{/c} enemies.
Affix_legendary_sorc_107.name: Glacial

Affix_legendary_sorc_108.desc: Casting {c_important}Ice Armor{/c} makes you {c_important}Unstoppable{/c} for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_sorc_108.name: Snowveiled

Affix_legendary_sorc_109.desc: While {c_important}Ice Armor{/c} is active, you leave behind exploding {c_important}Ice Spikes{/c} that deal {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} damage. Your {c_important}Ice Spikes{/c} {c_important}Chill{/c} enemies for {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.
Affix_legendary_sorc_109.name: of the Frozen Wake

Affix_legendary_sorc_110.desc: {c_important}Ice Shards{/c} pierce {c_random}[ceil(1/(Affix_Value_1/100))-1]{/c} times, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} less damage per subsequent enemy hit.
Affix_legendary_sorc_110.name: of Piercing Cold

Affix_legendary_sorc_111.desc: While {c_important}Deep Freeze{/c} is active, you restore {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life and Mana.
Affix_legendary_sorc_111.name: Encased

Affix_legendary_sorc_112.desc: Your Lucky Hit Chance is increased by {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} while you have a Barrier active.
Affix_legendary_sorc_112.name: of Frozen Fortune

Affix_legendary_sorc_113.desc: When you {c_important}Freeze{/c} an enemy there is a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance they become {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_sorc_113.name: of Biting Cold

Affix_legendary_sorc_114.desc: Enemies that die while {c_important}Frozen{/c} have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to unleash a {c_important}Frost Nova{/c}.
Affix_legendary_sorc_114.name: Frozen Torrent

Affix_legendary_sorc_115.desc: You deal {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage to {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} enemies while you have a {c_important}Barrier{/c}.
Affix_legendary_sorc_115.name: Storm Swell

Affix_legendary_sorc_116.desc: While {c_important}Deep Freeze{/c} is active, exploding {c_important}Ice Spikes{/c} form in the area, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Cold damage. Your {c_important}Ice Spikes{/c} have a {c_number}[Affix_Value_1 * 100|%|]{/c} increased explosion radius.
Affix_legendary_sorc_116.name: of the Frozen Tundra

Affix_legendary_sorc_117.desc: While {c_important}Unstable Currents{/c} is active, your passive Mana Regeneration is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.
Affix_legendary_sorc_117.name: of Volatile Currents

Affix_legendary_sorc_118.desc: Each time {c_important}Chain Lightning{/c} bounces off you, gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} Mana.
Affix_legendary_sorc_118.name: Recharging

Affix_legendary_sorc_119.desc: {c_important}Ball Lightning{/c} travels back to you after reaching the end of its path, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} less damage.
Affix_legendary_sorc_119.name: of Static Cling

Affix_legendary_sorc_120.desc: Critical Strikes to Close enemies increase {c_important}Vyrâ€™s Masteryâ€™s{/c} bonuses by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_sorc_120.name: Mage-Lord's

Affix_legendary_sorc_121.desc: {c_important}Lightning Spear{/c} has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to spawn an additional {c_important}Lightning Spear{/c} when you cast it.
Affix_legendary_sorc_121.name: of Splintering Energy

Affix_legendary_sorc_122.desc: {c_important}Chain Lightning{/c} has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to chain {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} additional times.
Affix_legendary_sorc_122.name: of the Unbroken Tether

Affix_legendary_sorc_123.desc: Gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} Movement Speed for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds after {c_important}Teleporting{/c}.
Affix_legendary_sorc_123.name: of the Bounding Conduit

Affix_legendary_sorc_124.desc: After being active for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, {c_important}Lightning{/c} Skill casts during {c_important}Unstable Currents{/c} have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to trigger an additional {c_important}Lightning{/c} Skill.
Affix_legendary_sorc_124.name: Stabilizing

Affix_legendary_sorc_126.desc: Taking direct damage has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to reset the Cooldown of one of your {c_important}Defensive{/c} Skills.
Affix_legendary_sorc_126.name: of the Unwavering

Affix_legendary_sorc_127.desc: {c_important}Core{/c} or {c_important}Mastery{/c} Skills cast at or above {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Mana gain a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Chance.
Affix_legendary_sorc_127.name: Elementalist's

Affix_legendary_sorc_128.desc: Your passive Mana Regeneration is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} if you have not taken damage in the last {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Affix_legendary_sorc_128.name: of Concentration

Affix_legendary_sorc_129.desc: You deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} more damage to Immobilized, Stunned, or {c_important}Frozen{/c} enemies.
Affix_legendary_sorc_129.name: of Control

Affix_legendary_sorc_130.desc: Your Critical Strike Chance is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of your Movement Speed bonus.
Affix_legendary_sorc_130.name: Deft Magusâ€™

Affix_legendary_sorc_131.desc: You take {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} less damage from Crowd Controlled or {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} enemies.
Affix_legendary_sorc_131.name: Everliving

Affix_legendary_sorc_132.desc: Casting a {c_important}Basic{/c} skill reduces the Mana cost of your next {c_important}Core{/c} skill by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c}.
Affix_legendary_sorc_132.name: of Efficiency

Affix_1HWand_Unique_Sorc_100.desc: While Channeling {c_important}Incinerate{/c}, you periodically shoot embers that are attracted to enemies, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Fire damage.
Affix_1HWand_Unique_Sorc_100.flavor: The burn may heal, but the pain is eternal.
Affix_1HWand_Unique_Sorc_100.name: Flamescar

Affix_2HStaff_Unique_Sorc_002.desc: {c_important}Fireball{/c_important} launches {c_number}3{/c} projectiles that deal {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} of normal damage.
Affix_2HStaff_Unique_Sorc_002.flavor:
"Leaving even blackened bones for your kin to mourn is too good an end for you." 
- Josiah
Affix_2HStaff_Unique_Sorc_002.name: Staff of Endless Rage

Affix_Amulet_Unique_Sorc_100.desc: Collecting {c_important}Crackling Energy{/c} while full releases a lightning nova, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Lightning damage to enemies around you.
Affix_Amulet_Unique_Sorc_100.flavor: The only thing more potent than Esadora's magic was her endless hatred of humanity. As she lay dying, the pale amulet around her neck drank in both.
Affix_Amulet_Unique_Sorc_100.name: Esadora's Overflowing Cameo

Affix_Chest_Unique_Sorc_002.desc: After using {c_important}Teleport{/c}, Close enemies are Pulled to you and Stunned for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds, but {c_important}Teleport's{/c} Cooldown is increased by {c_number}x[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c}.
Affix_Chest_Unique_Sorc_002.flavor: The power you have is never enough.
Affix_Chest_Unique_Sorc_002.name: Raiment of the Infinite

Affix_Gloves_Unique_Sorc_002.desc: {c_important}Fireball{/c_important} now bounces as it travels, exploding each time it hits the ground, but its explosion deals {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} less damage.
Affix_Gloves_Unique_Sorc_002.flavor: After Inarius returned to Sanctuary, he sought a way back to the High Heavens. His first step was to re-ignite the religion he had abandoned millennia before: The Cathedral of Light.
Affix_Gloves_Unique_Sorc_002.name: Gloves of the Illuminator

Affix_Gloves_Unique_Sorc_100.desc: Free casts from the {c_important}Icefall{/c} Passive gain {c_random}+[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} Attack Speed.
Affix_Gloves_Unique_Sorc_100.flavor:
"While scholars have since proven these gloves were not created by Esu herself, it is noteworthy that they have been passed down in an unbroken line since the formation of the Mage Clans." 
- Barrett's Book of Implements
Affix_Gloves_Unique_Sorc_100.name: Esu's Heirloom

Affix_Ring_Unique_Sorc_100.desc: Explosions from the {c_important}Shatter{/c} Passive deal {c_random}x[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} increased damage if enemies die while {c_important}Frozen{/c}.
Affix_Ring_Unique_Sorc_100.flavor: The mad artisan saw his fingers turn black from frostbite as he worked on the ring, but refused to stay the hammer for even a moment.
Affix_Ring_Unique_Sorc_100.name: Iceheart Band

Affix_Ring_Unique_Sorc_101.desc: {c_important}Crackling Energy{/c} has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to chain to an additional enemy.
Affix_Ring_Unique_Sorc_101.flavor:
"Yours is the power to pluck the stars from the heavens with the ease of a child gathering fruit from the bough." 
- Esu, to an unknown Sorcerer
Affix_Ring_Unique_Sorc_101.name: Ring of Starless Skies
